channel.title: Comments for page "Mission Bonus"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Mission Bonus"

item.title: Drunken Fist Bonus!
item.content:encoded: The Drunken Fist theme page says the bonus is +1 level/2 juice. The table on the Mission Bonus page says it is +1 level/3 juice. I don't have the theme to test it, but one must be wrong.
